text: Can you add a reminder for me?
Sure, when would you like to be reminded and what would you like me to remind you of?
Can you remind me to call John at 3 pm tomorrow? Today is 2022-05-24
Got it. What's your username and password?
Username is user1 and password is user1pass.
Your reminder has been added successfully. You will be reminded to call John at 3 pm tomorrow.
